import React from 'react'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import './header.styles.scss' import {ReactComponent as Logo} from '../../assests/crown.svg' import { auth } from '../../firebase/firebase.utill'; const Header=({currentuser})=>{ return
Crown
SHOP
CONTACT
{ currentuser?
auth.signOut()}> SIGN OUT {currentuser.displayName}
: SIGN IN }
} export default Header;
